description: This file implements a traceback logging mechanism in C. It manages a ring buffer to store recent log messages for debugging purposes, defines functions to initialize the traceback logger, and handles message logging and matching criteria.

methods.name: void logger_traceback_log(logger_t * l,logger_msg_t * msg)
methods.description: Logs messages into a ring buffer for traceback, filtering based on message severity and module.

methods.name: bool logger_traceback_match(log_severity_t sev,log_module_t module)
methods.description: Determines whether a message should be included in the traceback buffer based on severity and module.

methods.name: bool logger_traceback_new(logger_t * l)
methods.description: Initializes a new logger object with traceback logging and matching functions.
